content.question: Which of the following developments would gradually undo the progress made in the period following the Civil War?

choices.label: The passage of laws at the federal level that limited the political rights of African Americans
The passage of Jim Crow laws that disenfranchised African Americans
The ratification of Civil Rights legislation that made racial discrimination illegal
The ruling in Brown v. Board of Education of Topeka that outlawed the “separate but equal” doctrine

content.answer: The passage of Jim Crow laws that disenfranchised African Americans

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
